Name: The Ambition that Lies Hidden
AttributesDescription:
Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: In the opening act, an obscure youth boarded the ship with nothing but a dagger. In the final act, a notorious pirate captain met his end, betrayed by his own confidant, sinking with a dagger into the deep.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Spectro DMG by 12.5% for each stack of Spectro Frazzle inflicted on targets, stacking up to 10 times. This effect lasts for 15s.
